unit.creator: Philodemus || Avdoulou, Eleni
unit.title: Index Pythagoreorum || Fr. 32 PHerc. 1508 || Diplomatic Apparatus

dsl.content: 1 ][ dext. inf. desc., (ο, ω), med. horiz. 2 ]ρ̣χ̣⟦ dext. vest., (o, ε, ϲ), sup. horiz. 3 ]γ̣υ̣[ dext. desc., sup. horiz., vert. fort. bis superos., sin. inf. asc. et med. horiz., (α, λ), (ρ, β, ο), sin. med. vest., dext. sup. horiz. 4 ]καια̣[ (η, ι), (γ, π), sin. inf. asc. et dext. sup. desc.
